thread.section_title: Veaul 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Veaul 的点评意见 | veaul.com
thread.title: scott Steve
thread.title_full: Veaul 的点评人 scott Steve

author: scott Steve
title: scott Steve
text: I just got the dress I ordered for my sister, I can't thank you guys enough, the dress is exactly like the picture and is beautiful. I sent pictures to the bride my sister and she absolutely loved it. I am planning on ordering maybe my other sister's dress and my mother's dress too. It was shipped and arrived in no time... thanks again. I will recommend you to all my friends and family... As soon as I go to Cairo for the wedding I will send you pictures of the bride in her dress and veil.
